title: Star Guardian Taric
body: This would go so well with the rework plus he needs a new skin. Pls rito.

replies.body:
Star Guardian Urgot first please, the idea is too good to pass up XD

https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/hphotos-xat1/t51.2885-15/s640x640/sh0.08/e35/12407602_687351808034397_571710744_n.jpg
Lol da fuq,aint nobody buying that

Oh ahah, I think there's a few who would ;)

But seriously, it's got some popularity already. It's made the front page of Reddit multiple times now. [Here](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/40og4d/star_guardian_urgot_is_real_now_you_chose_this/)'s a recently popular post about it.
